pages.text: $(l)Notes:$()$(li)Quest pages will make the entry show up with a checkmark once the quest is completed.$(li)Entries that show up with a checkmark will show up at the end of the list to be out of the way.$(li)If you use a quest page, it is recommended you also use "turnin" in the entry.

pages.title: My Quest
pages.text: Quest Pages are tied to advancements.$(br2)In this example, the Botania achivement, "$(l)Sky of the Beginning$()" was used.$(br2)If you wish to create custom advancements, then use the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/triumph)TRIUMPH$(/l) mod.
